prompts.question: Hi [Patient First Name], on a scale of 1-10, would you recommend Dr [Doctor Last Name] to a friend or family member? 1 = Would not recommend, 10 = Would strongly recommend

We appreciate the feedback. One last question: How do you feel about being diagnosed with [Diagnosis]?
